remarks: A structure product of topologies is a topological space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
prdstopn.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdstopn.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdstopn.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdstps.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> TopSp ) $.
prdstps $p |- ( ph -> Y e. TopSp ) $.
